shopifyProduct.descriptionHtml:
<p>**1.5" OD Male RJT ended butterfly valve **</p>

<p><strong>Made with 316 Food Grade Stainless</strong></p>

<p>Valve seal material is food grade EDPM</p>

<p>Grade 316 stainless is a stainless steel alloy with a high chromium and nickel content. Like many steel alloys, it has a continuous use temperature several times higher than most food making processes will ever require (more than 800째C, or 1472째F).</p>

<p><strong>Handle Options</strong></p>

<p>Handle option one - As standard our valves are fitted with lever handles which are common place in the food and beverage industry. </p>

<p>Handle option two - Our valves can be fitted with locking pull handles. Pull handles are particularily good for hot side use as the locking gates reduce the risk of the valve opening accidentally. </p>

<p>Handle option three - Micrometric handle option is used to regulate the flow of liquid through a butterfly valve. This can be used to reduce the flow or wort or control the flow of water into the chiller unit. </p>
